title: Italian mafia fugitive caught in Dominican Republic after police find YouTube cooking show
content:
1. Italian mafia fugitive caught in Dominican Republic after police find YouTube cooking show  NBC News
  2. Mafia fugitive caught after YouTube cooking show accidentally reveals his identity: Report  Fox News
  3. For years, a mafia fugitive hid from police. Then they spotted his Italian cooking videos on YouTube.  The Washington Post
  4. Mafia fugitive was living a quiet island life. Then police found his YouTube cooking show.  Yahoo News
  5. Italian Mafia Fugitive's Cooking Videos Lead Cops to Hideout  The Daily Beast
  6. View Full Coverage on Google News

localize.title: 意大利黑手党逃犯在多米尼加被抓获后，警方在YouTube上发现了烹饪节目。
意大利黑手黨逃犯在多米尼加被抓獲後，警方在YouTube上發現了烹飪節目。
